title: Top Places to visit in Mau, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Mau, now known as Maunath Bhanjan, is a town located in Uttar Pradesh, India. This town is the headquarters of the Mau district.
 
Festivals
Common Indian Festivals such as Holi, Diwali, Eid-Ul-Fitar, Eid-Ul-Azha, Muharram, Durga Puja, Vijayadashami, Chhath Puja, Chri
